title: Suzuki Motorcycle introduces standard edition of Avenis scooter at Rs 86,500
description: Earlier, SMIPL had launched the 'Ride Connect' and 'Race' editions of Avenis. The scooter is powered by a 125cc engine, which delivers a power of 8.7ps at 6,750 rpm, the company said in a statement.
